title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3949/87 of 21 December 1987 again amending Articles 6 and 17 of the Protocol concerning the definition of the concept of ' originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation to the Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 3949/87
of 21 December 1987
again amending Articles 6 and 17 of the Protocol concerning the definition of the concept of 'originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation to the Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Protocol is hereby amended as follows:
1. In the second subparagraph of Article 6 (1), '2 355 ECU' is replaced by '2 590 ECU'.
2. In Article 17 (2), '165 ECU' is replaced by '180 ECU' and '470 ECU' by '515 ECU'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1987.
For the Council
The President
B. HAARDER
(1) OJ No L 41, 14. 3. 1983, p. 2.
(2) OJ No L 192, 16. 7. 1983, p. 3.
